entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
